price: Böylece sizin yerinize benzerlerinizi getirelim ve sizi bilmediğiniz bir âlemde tekrar var edelim diye (ölümü takdir ettik).
arabic: عَلَىٰٓ أَن نُّبَدِّلَ أَمۡثَٰلَكُمۡ وَنُنشِئَكُمۡ فِي مَا لَا تَعۡلَمُونَ

version.title: Turkish Translation - Ali Ozek
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Turkish by a group of scholars. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: ʿalā an nubaddila amthālakum wanunshi-akum fī mā lā taʿlamūna
